note.p: Market gardener. Resided in Clevedon, Somerset. Fellow of the Royal Horticultural Society.
Census returns of England and Wales, 1871 (Public Record Office, The National Archives RG10/2514/19/16)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 4 November 2014)
